api_list.api_description: Get ticker information for all or requested markets.

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: Asset pair to get data for (optional, default: all tradeable exchange pairs)

api_list.api_description: Get Level 1 Market Data for a specific trading pair, including bid/ask prices, last traded price, and size.

query: What are the latest ticker prices for the BTC-USD pair on both Kraken and KuCoin?
